original_title: Tales for the Midnight Hour II
overview: The Sleaze Box proudly presents creepy tales of terror from the master mind of Phil Herman. It’s a whole brand new anthology with tons of scares, twists and sleaze. Meet sexy sirens and crazed maniacs in these tales of terror. Watch at your own risk, TALES FOR THE MIDNIGHT HOUR 2! Hosted by Joel D. Wynkoop as The Reaper and a who’s who of the elite names of the horror underground such as Gary Whitson, Joe Sherlock, Dustin Hubbard, Chris Woods, Debbie D, Tina Krause, M. Catherine Wynkoop, Barry Gaines and of course Wynkoop and Herman.
title: Tales for the Midnight Hour II
